com.jackbe.presto.connect
Class ConnectionFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.jackbe.presto.connect.ConnectionFactory
public class ConnectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory class to create either local or remote connections to the Mashup Server.

  • LocalConnection - for invoking the server when clients are co-located in the same JVM
  • RemoteConnection - for invoking the server remotely over HTTP/REST

Author:
girish
